subject: Football
Suits and Litigation
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: A federal lawsuit filed against the N.F.L. Players Association by retirees was dismissed Tuesday by a judge who ruled they had no legal right to additional postcareer benefits they claimed they lost during lockout talks last year.
snippet: A federal lawsuit filed against the N.F.L. Players Association by retirees was dismissed Tuesday by a judge who ruled they had no legal right to additional postcareer benefits they claimed they lost during lockout talks last year.
